IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO PROVIDE ADVANCED ELECTRONIC AND INFORMATION TECHNOLOGIES TO THE NC EDUCATION COMMUNITY AND GOVERNMENT AGENCIES AND TO BENEFIT ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT IN NC.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO PROVIDE ADVANCED ELECTRONIC AND INFORMATION TECHNOLOGIES TO THE NC EDUCATION COMMUNITY AND GOVERNMENT AGENCIES AND TO BENEFIT ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT IN NC.
IRS990.Description: MCNC PROVIDES TECHNICAL INFRASTRUCTURE TO EDUCATE, INNOVATE AND ENHANCE ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT THROUGHOUT NORTH CAROLINA. MCNC SERVES THE NORTH CAROLINA EDUCATIONAL COMMUNITY BY PROVIDING HIGH QUALITY NETWORK INFRASTRUCTURE AND NETWORK BASED SERVICES. MCNC PROVIDES THE WAN/BACKBONE AND INTERNET CONNECTIVITY TO THE 17 STATE UNIVERSITIES, 20 COMMUNITY COLLEGES, 22 INDEPENDENT COLLEGES, 115 LOCAL EDUCATION AGENCIES (BASICALLY TO EACH COUNTY'S PUBLIC K-12 SCHOOL'S ADMINISTRATION), 3 LIBRARIES, 8 RESEARCH INSTITUTIONS, AND 5 GOVERNMENT AGENCIES. THESE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED WITH A SERVICE LEVEL AGREEMENT OF 99.99% "UP" TIME. MCNC ADDITIONALLY PROVIDES 11 STATE COLLEGES, 1 LIBRARY, 3 INDEPENDENT HIGHER EDUCATION COLLEGES, 4 GOVERNMENT AGENCIES, 4 RESEARCH INSTITUTIONS, AND 13 OTHER EDUCATION RELATED AGENCIES WITH COLOCATION/HOSTING OR BACKUP/STORAGE DATA CENTER SERVICES. THESE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED 24/7/365. DURING FY 2010, MCNC RECEIVED DONATED SERVICES FROM CISCO WITH A VALUE OF $124,998. ADDITIONALLY, THEY RECEIVED THE USE OF LAND FOR THEIR CAMPUS FROM TUCASI (TRIANGLE UNIVERSITIES CENTER FOR ADVANCED STUDIES, INC.), VALUED AT $783,469.

AddressUS.AddressLine1: 4350 LASSITER AT NORTH HILLS A STE

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: GENERAL INFORMATION ON GRANTS AND ASSISTANCE
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: WHILE THE GRANTS ITEMIZED IN PART II WERE PROVIDED WITH A SPECIFIC INTENT IN MIND, NO STIPULATIONS WERE MADE ON THEIR USE AND NO MONITORING IS REQUIRED.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI - SECTION B, LINE 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: WHILE THE 990 WAS NOT PROVIDED TO THE GOVERNING BODY BEFORE IT WAS FILED, THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS WERE. IT IS THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER TO VERIFY THE RECONCILIATION OF THE TAX RETURN TO THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENT PRIOR TO THE TAX RETURN BEING FILED.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI - SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MCNC'S DIRECTORS ARE REQUIRED TO SIGN A NEW CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY STATEMENT ANNUALLY. SUBSEQUENT REVIEW OF ANY NOTED EXCEPTIONS ARE APPROPRIATELY ACTED UPON IF REQUIRED.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI - SECTION B, LINE 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: COMPENSATION FOR MCNC'S CEO/PRESIDENT IS DERIVED THROUGH A MULTI-FACETED APPROACH. SALARY SURVEY DATA IS COLLECTED AND SHARED WITH THE BOARD'S NOMINATING & GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE. THE NOMINATING & GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE THEN PRESENTS THEIR RECOMMENDATION TO THE BOARD. UPON A PROPERLY RECORDED BOARD VOTE, A CONTRACT IS THEN EXECUTED. FOR ALL OTHER POSITIONS, EACH JOB IS CAREFULLY STUDIED BY THE DIRECTOR OF HUMAN RESOURCES AND A JOB CLASS ASSIGNED. SALARY SURVEY DATA IS THEN COLLECTED AND A SALARY RANGE FOR THE JOB CLASS IS DETERMINED IF THE CLASS DID NOT HAVE A PREVIOUSLY DETERMINED RANGE (NEW JOB CLASSES WOULD BE THE ONLY CASE WHERE RANGES ARE NOT CURRENTLY AVAILABLE). THE EMPLOYEE IS THEN OFFERED A SALARY WITHIN THE RANGE BASED ON THEIR SPECIFIC SKILL SETS AND EXPERIENCE LEVELS. ANY OFFICER SALARY BEYOND THE CEO/PRESIDENT'S COMPENSATION FURTHER REQUIRES BOARD APPROVAL.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: MAKING INFORMATION AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC
GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI - SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MCNC'S MISSION IS POSTED ON THE MCNC WEBSITE. OUR ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION ARE AVAILABLE ON-LINE WITH THE NC SECRETARY OF THE STATE'S OFFICE. ALL OTHER DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON WRITTEN REQUEST TO THE CORPORATE SECRETARY.
